metadata.title: USN-4107-1 -- GIFLIB vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that GIFLIB incorrectly handled certain GIF files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. This issue only affected Ubuntu 18.04 LTS. (CVE-2016-3977)  It was discovered that GIFLIB incorrectly handled certain GIF files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2018-11490, CVE-2019-15133)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4107-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  giflib-tools - 5.1.4-2ubuntu0.1 libgif-dev - 5.1.4-2ubuntu0.1 libgif7 - 5.1.4-2ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
